!Karakawei: Shilen's children, listen. Be hot afraid of her, even though she is surrounded by the coldness of death. I, Karakawei, shaman the Elroki tribe, tell you that one day, she will again rise and be enthroned in the heavens, and on that day will again take your hand in hers. Thus it has been revealed to me -- hear the words of Shilen! [npc_%objectId%_Quest|Quest]
